modName: Killer Keos and Calientes armors for CBBEv3 slim BBP
summary: Some armors and clothes converted for slim cbbe with bbp
descriptionHtml:
THIS MOD IS OUTDATED AND I NO LONGER PROVIDE ANY SUPPORT FOR IT. THERE ARE NEWER MODS THAT CONVERT THESE ARMORS FOR BODYSLIDE AND BBP. YOU CAN FIND MOST OF SUCH MODS ON LOVERSLAB, AND SOME HERE ON NEXUS.

Description:

I\'ve been having hard time trying to find bouncy armors that don\'t have boobies like beachballs and ultimately decided to try making some myself. And it turned out so well I decided to release them for everyone!

The result here is a mix of Caliente\'s and Killer Keo\'s armors and clothes fitted for slightly edited CBBEv3 Slim body. Bodyslider chest setting for every armor and clothing is breastsmall 20-100% with increased cleavage from Mooballz\'s extra sliders.

Includes some heavy armors which realistically shouldn\'t bounce but which I made bounce anyways. Pick and choose by manual install if you don\'t want those. 

I only edited meshes and they are vanilla replacers. All texture mods should be compatible.

ENDORSE IF YOU LIKE THE MOD :)

Uploaded my preset file as requested. Install Moonballz\'s 15 extra sliders first http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11920 
It\'s saved to effect CB+ BBP body, Stuffed_Bunny\'s Keo\'s conversions, Chronotrigger77\'s MAK conversions and Caliente\'s conversions. 
I recommend using Stuffed_Bunny\'s BodySlide++ (find it all at loverslab)

-------------------------

Converted Armors:
Forsworn armor
Fur armors
Dark Brotherhood armor
Dwarven armor
Ebony armor
Ebony mail
Elven & Elven light armors
Glass armor
Hide armor
Scale armors
Nightingale armor
Orcish armor
Savior\'s Hide
Stormcloak armor
Guard armors
Studded armor
Thieves guild armors
Wolf armor
Dawnguard armors 1,2,4,5
Vampire armor
Vampire Royal armor
Ancient Falmer armor
!!!Heavy Falmer armor!!! Included but needs to be manually installed. I made some error with this so there\'s no weight slider. Cba fix it right now...

Converted clothes:
Vampire robes
Barkeeper outfit
Beggar clothes
Blacksmith outfit
Chef outfit
Fine clothes 1 and 2
Jester outfit
Merchant clothes
Miner clothes
Necromancer robe
Psiijic robe (you need external mod or console to get it)
Dark Brotherhood robes
Wedding dress


-------------------------

Installation:

NMM or drop in Skyrim folder. 

ALWAYS BACKUP YOUR DATA BEFORE INSTALLING NEW STUFF!!

--------------------------

Required Mods:

Caliente body: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666
Skeleton with BBP support: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26800
-------------------------

Known issues:

Falmer heavy has no slider.
Forsworn armor has one messed up verticle but it\'s relatively minor problem. Gonna fix it later.
Some Dawnguard faction armors have texture issues and appear completely black.

-------------------------
FAQ:

Q: I don\'t like your armors but I replaced my old ones and now I can\'t get them back!! I didn\'t backup my files that\'s for pussies and nerds lol!
A: Too bad! 

Q: Can you convert this and this armor?
A: No, don\'t think so. I may consider it if I really like the armor but default answer is no.

Q: There\'s no bouncing!
A: See required mods (you need skeleton with bounce bounce bounce support.

Q: I found a bug/issue with armor, what do I do?
A: You can leave a comment and if it\'s something worth fixing, I\'ll take a look at it.

----------------------

Credits:
Caliente for CBBE body, some of the armors and clothes and the Bodyslide tool.
Killer Keo for some of the armors and clothes.
Moonballz for 15 extra sliders.
Stuffed_Bunny over at Loverslab for converting Killer Keo\'s armors and clothes for Bodyslide.
XP32 for his Maximum Skeleton.
CherryHotaling over at Loverslab for BBP 3DS MAX conversion guide

Tools used:
Bodyslide
3DS MAX
NifSkope
author: Kuunkulta
